subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miami gave a seven-year, $49.57 million contract extension to Christian Yelich, an outfielder part of a homegrown core four aiming to return the team to the glory of its two World Series runs.
snippet: Miami gave a seven-year, $49.57 million contract extension to Christian Yelich, an outfielder part of a homegrown core four aiming to return the team to the glory of its two World Series runs.
